mapper.select: SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_VIEW_COUNT, TBP.POST_TYPE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.POST_CREATE_AT, TBU.USER_EMAIL, TBU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID

SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_VIEW_COUNT, TBP.POST_TYPE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.POST_CREATE_AT, TBU.USER_EMAIL, TBU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID AND TBP.ID = #{id}

SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_VIEW_COUNT, TBP.POST_TYPE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.POST_CREATE_AT, TBU.USER_EMAIL, TBU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID AND TBP.USER_ID = #{userId}
